newsitem.title: FRANCE: French Nov ind prod up 0.2 pct ex construction.
newsitem.headline: French Nov ind prod up 0.2 pct ex construction.

text.p: National statistics institute INSEE said on Wednesday industrial production, excluding construction, rose 0.2 percent in November from the previous month and was up 1.7 percent year-on-year. Industrial production excluding energy, agri-food businesses and construction -- considered by INSEE the best measure of manufacturing output -- fell 0.3 percent in November from the previous month, giving a year-on-year rise of 1.1 percent.
It gave the following seasonally adjusted data based on a new index introduced in January 1996.
The previous index used a base year of 1985.
INSEE gave the following seasonally adjusted percentage changes:
Nov vs Oct Oct vs Sep yr/yr*

NOTE - Comparison with year-ago period is for three months to end November versus the three months in the same period last year. INSEE said on Dec 20 that industrial output excluding construction fell 0.8 percent in October from September while manufacturing output fell 1.2 percent.
